titleStmt.title: A prayse, and reporte of Maister Martyne Forboishers voyage to Meta Incognita. (A name giuen by a mightie and most great personage) in which praise and reporte is written diuers discourses neuer published by any man as yet. Now spoken of by Thomas Churchyarde Gentleman, and dedicated to the right honorable M. Secretarie Wilson, one of the Queenes Maiesties most honorable Priuie Counsell.
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Felix Kingston] for Andrew Maunsell in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Parret,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: The tenth of Maye. 1578.
With a final leaf of verses.
Running title reads: The voyage to Meta Incognita.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Parret
